author: Lon.TV
description:
Find them on Amazon: https://lon.tv/msa5v (compensated affiliate link) - Asus has a new line of Wi-Fi 7 mesh units for their mesh networking system, including one with support for 10 gig ethernet networks. See more networking: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsjVNQfNZwRHgB0CESn9UVJ and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
